tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: Our Office of the Historian documents the conduct of diplomacy over time. They've gone back through the "Foreign Relations of the United States” (published since 1861) to share anecdotes on past outbreaks of disease. Check back for these #FRUS learning snacks from #FSIatHome!
